title: Science Education Utilizing Multimodal Representations: Mobile Microlearning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Application-Based Education in Social Fields for Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts by integrating various modalities (text, graphs, videos, simulations, etc.).
Learners can analyze the scientific meaning of multimodal materials and apply critical thinking through writing-to-learn strategies.
Learners can accurately explain core concepts of modern physics at over 80% accuracy using interactive multimodal materials in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
